Package Controllers.Registered.RegisteredGroups

Class ControllerGroup

java.lang.Object
Controllers.Registered.RegisteredGroups.ControllerGroup
public class ControllerGroup
extends java.lang.Object
This Controller counts with the functionalities for Groups
Author:

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ControllerGroup​(PanelRegisteredGroups view)
    This is the controller for the Groups View, with the functions that the view needs

  • Method Summary

    void create​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String father)
    This method creates a group by calling the method in the application

    Method to get the searched group by the passed name
    void home()
    Home method to go to the primary view.
    boolean join​(java.lang.String name)
    This method allows the user to join the group with the passed name as argument by calling the application method

    Unstacks the view to the previous one.

  • Constructor Details

    • ControllerGroup

      public ControllerGroup​(PanelRegisteredGroups view)
      This is the controller for the Groups View, with the functions that the view needs
      Parameters:
      view - RegisteredGroup view

  • Method Details

    • join

      public boolean join​(java.lang.String name)
      This method allows the user to join the group with the passed name as argument by calling the application method
      Parameters:
      name - name of the group to join
      Returns:
      true if the user joins the application

    • getInfo

      public Group getInfo​(java.lang.String name)
      Method to get the searched group by the passed name
      Parameters:
      name - name of the group to get the info of
      Returns:
      Group asked for information

    • create

      public void create​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String father)
      This method creates a group by calling the method in the application
      Parameters:
      name - name of the new group
      description - description of the new group
      father - father of the new group (can be null if its a root)

    • newGroup

      public void newGroup()
      Unstacks the view to the previous one.

    • home

      public void home()
      Home method to go to the primary view.
